resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/81499</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>81499</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4223</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Dealing with a sensory impairment in the classroom</string>
            <string language="es">Tratamiento de una deficiencia sensorial en la clase</string>
            <string language="ga">Ag déileáil le lagú céadfach sa seomra ranga</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Beschäftigen eine sensorische Beeinträchtigung 
im Klassenzimmer</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Traiter un affaiblissement sensoriel dans la 
salle de classe</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Tratar de um impairment sensory na sala de aula</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Occupandosi di un danno sensitivo nell'aula</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εξέταση μιας αισθητήριας εξασθένισης στην τάξη</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This advice sheet is aimed at children with special needs(hearing impairment). It offers practical davice on how to deal with this difficulty in the classroom.</string>
            <string language="es">Esta hoja de consejos está dirigida a niños con necesidades especiales (discapacidades auditivas). Ofrece consejos prácticos sobre como tratar esta dificultad en la clase.</string>
            <string language="ga">Tá an bileog chomhairle seo dírithe ar dhaltaí le riachtanais speisialta (lagú éisteachta). Tugann sé comhairle phraiticiúil ar an gcaoi le déileáil le is an deacracht seo sa seomra ranga.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">General</string>
            <string language="es">General. Hoja de consejos</string>
            <string language="ga">Ginearálta</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Advice Sheet</string>
            <string language="ga">Bileog Chomhairle</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Rateblatt ist- angestrebte Kinder mit 
spezieller needs(hearing Beeinträchtigung). Es bietet 
praktisches davice auf an, wie man diese Schwierigkeit im 
Klassenzimmer beschäftigt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette feuille de conseil est les enfants 
visés avec l'affaiblissement needs(hearing spécial). Elle 
offre le davice pratique sur la façon dont traiter cette difficulté 
dans la salle de classe.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta folha do conselho é crianças visadas com 
impairment needs(hearing especial). Oferece o davice prático em
como tratar desta dificuldade na sala de aula.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo foglio di consiglio è bambini puntati su 
con danno needs(hearing speciale). Offre il davice pratico su 
come risolvere questa difficoltà nell'aula.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το φύλλο συμβουλών στοχεύουν στα παιδιά με την 
ειδική needs(hearing εξασθένιση). Προσφέρει το πρακτικό 
davice στο πώς να εξετάσει αυτήν την δυσκολία στην τάξη.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Allgemein</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Rateblatt</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Généralités</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Feuille de conseil</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Geral</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Folha Do Conselho</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Generalità</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Foglio Di Consiglio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γενικό</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φύλλο συμβουλών</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
